dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Hi, there {activator.name}. Welcome to the school library. Please try to keep quiet so others can study in peace.

dialog.name: book
dialog.message: We have plenty of books. Please feel free to ask Ruri if you need some assistance.

response.message: Ask about the Eastern Project series.

dialog.name: main_menu
dialog.message: Was there anything else you wanted to talk about {activator.name}?

dialog.name: touhou
dialog.message: This name is, of course, translated from its original language, but it basically means the same thing. You should be able to find a copy in the library but it's very popular here so someone may be reading them right now.

dialog.name: ruri
dialog.message: Don't mind her. She knows a bit too much but she's a hard worker. You wouldn't really expect most fairies to be that smart, though... it's kind of weird. I wonder if maybe I should ask the summoning instructor to look into the spell I used to summon her.

dialog.name: nanoha
dialog.message: Excellent deduction. Yes, my parents were, indeed, quite the fans of the Nanoha series.

dialog.name: patchouli
dialog.message: Ah, I see you like the Eastern Project series, too. It's fairly obvious why I should be a fan of her, don't you think?
